document_data.name: Brawling Hands
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Brawling Hands''''' were a pair of ''[[gauntlets of dexterity]]'' that were believed to have been crafted in the lands of [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Powers: These gauntlets greatly increased the agility of the wearer, assuming they didn't already possess heroic-level reflexes.
document_data.History:
There were legends that stated the ''Brawling Hands'' were worn a master of the martial arts who brought them to [[Faer√ªn]] after a long journey from the Far East.

While it was not exactly known how these [[Item enchantment|magical]] [[gauntlet]]s first arrived on the [[Sword Coast]] they were seen in the possession of an [[ogrillon]] named [[Hairtooth]]. The [[half-orc]]/[[ogre]] regularly extorted travelers at a bridge crossing with his comrade [[Gnarl]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
